title: Jocuserious
author: Jocuserious
content: Congratulations india team for wining Asia cup 2023.this is cricket, thinks like that can happen. It was truly an amazing match and Siraj bowling performance was unmatched.

comments.author: Westinhome
comments.body: Quote from: Jocuserious on September 17, 2023, 02:18:01 PMCongratulations india team for wining Asia cup 2023.this is cricket, thinks like that can happen. It was truly an amazing match and Siraj bowling performance was unmatched.Today the game was favour the team India,the Siraj bowling had complete the quick win for the team India.Many of the cricket fans know,today match will bet the India Match.But no one except the match will end like this.Srilanka still had a good bowlers,the de silva and Patirana had good wickets in this Asia cup.But the 51 runs target is not the big target to counter attack even with the world class bowlers.All the bowlers of team India had made a good bowling today.Itâ€™s totally the team work of team India,Hadrik and Bumrah also made their best bowling today.The first drive catch by the Jadeja was the big positive hope to team India.
